name: Assault on NORAD

back_text: When Revealed: Each player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a [[Drone]] minion. Advance to stage 2B.

name: All Systems Go!
text: Hero Action: Choose: - Ready each [[Interface]] upgrade you control. - Search your deck and discard pile for an [[Interface]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)
real_text: Hero Action: Choose: - Ready each [[Interface]] upgrade you control. - Search your deck and discard pile for an [[Interface]] upgrade and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Rapid Deployment
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, remove 3 threat from a scheme.
real_text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Web-Trap
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, stun that enemy.
real_text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using a resource generated by SP//dr Suit's "Sync Ratio" ability, stun that enemy.

name: Aunt May & Uncle Ben
text: Action: Exhaust Aunt May & Uncle Ben and discard the top 2 cards of your deck (top 3 cards instead if you are in alter-ego form) → add each SP//dr card discarded this way to your hand.
real_text: Action: Exhaust Aunt May & Uncle Ben and discard the top 2 cards of your deck (top 3 cards instead if you are in alter-ego form) → add each SP//dr card discarded this way to your hand.

real_text: Hero Action: Discard Ejection Protocol → exhaust each [[Interface]] upgrade you control, set your hit point dial to 6, give your identity a tough status card, and flip to alter-ego form.

name: SP//dr Command
text: Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command and an [[Interface]] upgrade → draw 1 card. Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command, choose and discard 1 card from your hand → ready an [[Interface]] upgrade.
real_text: Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command and an [[Interface]] upgrade → draw 1 card. Hero Action: Exhaust SP//dr Command, choose and discard 1 card from your hand → ready an [[Interface]] upgrade.

name: Host Spider
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Host Spider → ready SP//dr Suit.
real_text: Hero Action: Exhaust Host Spider → ready SP//dr Suit.
flavor: "He trusts you… so will I." —Peni Parker

name: Psychic Link
text: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit makes a basic thwart, exhaust Psychic Link → it gets +2 THW for that thwart.
real_text: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit makes a basic thwart, exhaust Psychic Link → it gets +2 THW for that thwart.

real_text: Hero Interrupt: When SP//dr Suit defends against an attack, exhaust Speed-Metal Alloy → it gets +2 DEF for that defense.

real_text: Hero Interrupt: When SP/dr Suit makes a basic attack, exhaust Web-Fluid Compressor → it gets +2 ATK for that attack.

text: Response: After Daredevil defends against an attack, move 1 damage from him to the attacking enemy.
real_text: Response: After Daredevil defends against an attack, move 1 damage from him to the attacking enemy.

real_text: X is equal to the number of facedown cards attached to Spider-Man Noir. Response: After you resolve a treachery, if you control another [[Web-Warrior]] card, attach that treachery facedown here (to a maximum of 3).

real_text: Hero Action: Discard a [[Tech]] upgrade you control → ready your hero and choose THW, ATK, or DEF. Until the end of the round, your hero gets +X to the chosen power, where X is equal to that upgrade's printed cost.

real_text: Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to a [[Web-Warrior]] character you control → place a total of 2 stun status cards on up to 2 enemies.

flavor: Stryfe is attempting to escape into the past. Who knows what havoc he will wreak?
back_flavor:
Hope breaks free from Stryfe's grasp, but she struggles to contain his powerful psionic energies.
"I will leave Hope to finish the job of killing you all," Stryfe laughs. "I have work to do bringing about the Apocalypse!"

Shhnk! — Setup: Put X-23's Claws into play.

Action: Shuffle either the Honey Badger ally or the Sisterly Bond event from your discard pile into your deck → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
linked_card.real_text: Shhnk! — Setup: Put X-23's Claws into play. Action: Shuffle either the Honey Badger ally or the Sisterly Bond event from your discard pile into your deck → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Laura Kinney
text: Shhnk! — Setup: Put X-23's Claws into play. Action: Shuffle either the Honey Badger ally or the Sisterly Bond event from your discard pile into your deck → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
real_text: Shhnk! — Setup: Put X-23's Claws into play. Action: Shuffle either the Honey Badger ally or the Sisterly Bond event from your discard pile into your deck → draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

name: X-23's Claws
text: Permanent. Hero Action: Exhaust X-23's Claws and take 2 damage → X-23 gets +2 ATK until the end of the round.
real_text: Permanent. Hero Action: Exhaust X-23's Claws and take 2 damage → X-23 gets +2 ATK until the end of the round.

name: Honey Badger
text: Hero Response: After Honey Badger takes any amount of damage, ready X-23.
real_text: Hero Response: After Honey Badger takes any amount of damage, ready X-23.
flavor: "You don't scare me. And I won't let you mess with my friends anymore!"

name: Animal Instinct
text: Hero Interrupt: When X-23 makes a basic thwart, she gets +X THW for this thwart, where X is equal to her ATK.
real_text: Hero Interrupt: When X-23 makes a basic thwart, she gets +X THW for this thwart, where X is equal to her ATK.
flavor: X-23 inherited Wolverine's superhuman senses...as well as his charming personality.

name: Claw Mastery
text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Until the end of the round, X-23 gets +2 ATK (and her attacks gain overkill while Honey Badger is in play).
real_text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Until the end of the round, X-23 gets +2 ATK (and her attacks gain overkill while Honey Badger is in play).

name: Regenerative Longevity
text: Action: Heal a total of 4 damage from your identity and Honey Badger.
real_text: Action: Heal a total of 4 damage from your identity and Honey Badger.
flavor: "If what doesn't kill you makes you stronger, I should have Colossus-level strength by now." — X-23

name: Sisterly Bond
text: Hero Interrupt: When Honey Badger thwarts or attacks, add X-23's matching power to Honey Badger's power for this use.
real_text: Hero Interrupt: When Honey Badger thwarts or attacks, add X-23's matching power to Honey Badger's power for this use.
flavor: "High five!" — Honey Badger

name: Sisterhood
text: Action: Exhaust Sisterhood and discard an X-23 card from your hand → search your deck and discard pile for Honey Badger and add her to your hand. (Shuffle.)
real_text: Action: Exhaust Sisterhood and discard an X-23 card from your hand → search your deck and discard pile for Honey Badger and add her to your hand. (Shuffle.)
flavor: Laura and Gabby's bond is stronger than genetics.

name: Adamantium Lacing
text:
You get +2 hit points.
X-23 gains retaliate 1 and her basic attacks gain piercing.
real_text:
You get +2 hit points.
X-23 gains retaliate 1 and her basic attacks gain piercing.
flavor: X-23's claws are coated with the metal adamantium, making them incredibly sharp and nearly indestructible.

name: Grim Resolve
text: Resource: Exhaust this card and take 1 damage → generate a [wild] resource.
real_text: Resource: Exhaust this card and take 1 damage → generate a [wild] resource.
flavor: "Is that all you got?" — X-23

name: Pain Tolerance
text: Response: After you play an X-23 card (including this one), heal 1 damage from your identity.
real_text: Response: After you play an X-23 card (including this one), heal 1 damage from your identity.
flavor: "Barely felt a thing." — X-23

name: Puncture Wound
text: Attach to an enemy that X-23 or Honey Badger attacked this turn. Attached enemy gets -1 ATK. Forced Response: After the player phase begins, discard this card and deal 3 damage to attached enemy.
real_text: Attach to an enemy that X-23 or Honey Badger attacked this turn. Attached enemy gets -1 ATK. Forced Response: After the player phase begins, discard this card and deal 3 damage to attached enemy.

name: Boom Boom
text: Action: Exhaust Boom Boom → add 1 boom counter to her. Then, you may discard Boom Boom to deal 1 damage to each enemy for each boom counter on her.
real_text: Action: Exhaust Boom Boom → add 1 boom counter to her. Then, you may discard Boom Boom to deal 1 damage to each enemy for each boom counter on her.
flavor: "Tick...tick...tick..."

name: Rictor
text: [star] Response: After Rictor attacks, discard the top card of your deck. Deal 1 damage to each minion engaged with you for each resource on the discarded card.
real_text: [star] Response: After Rictor attacks, discard the top card of your deck. Deal 1 damage to each minion engaged with you for each resource on the discarded card.

name: Shatterstar
text: [star] Interrupt: When Shatterstar attacks a minion, engage that minion. If you are already engaged with that minion, Shatterstar gets +1 ATK from this attack.
real_text: [star] Interrupt: When Shatterstar attacks a minion, engage that minion. If you are already engaged with that minion, Shatterstar gets +1 ATK from this attack.
flavor: A skilled swordfighter, Shatterstar can even cut openings in space to teleport vast distances.

name: Critical Hit
text: Play only if there is a side scheme in the victory display. Hero Response: After you attack an enemy, stun it.
real_text: Play only if there is a side scheme in the victory display. Hero Response: After you attack an enemy, stun it.

name: Keep Them Busy
text: Victory 0. Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme removes 5[per_hero] threat from the main scheme.
real_text: Victory 0. Assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.) When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme removes 5[per_hero] threat from the main scheme.

name: "Now I'm Mad"
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
While your hero's remaining hit points are less than half your hero's starting hit points, your hero gets +1 ATK and -1 THW.
real_text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.

real_text: Attach to a non-permanent side scheme. Limit 1 per side scheme. Attached scheme gains assault. (Basic thwarts against this scheme use ATK instead of THW.)

name: Specialized Training

real_text: Victory 0. When Defeated: Each player who does not control a [[SPECIALIZATION]] upgrade chooses 1 set-aside [[SPECIALIZATION]] upgrade and puts it into play under their control.

text: Play only if there is a side scheme in the victory display. Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects.

real_text: Victory 0. When Defeated: Heal 2 damage from each ally.

real_text: Play only if there is a side scheme in the victory display. Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy initiates an attack, give your hero a tough status card.

name: Self-Isolation
text: Give to the Laura Kinney player. Search your hand, deck, discard pile, and play area for Honey Badger and place her facedown under this obligation. If you cannot, discard this card and deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card. Response: After you make a basic recovery, discard this obligation and Honey Badger.
real_text: Give to the Laura Kinney player. Search your hand, deck, discard pile, and play area for Honey Badger and place her facedown under this obligation. name: Lady Deathstrike
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this minion discards the top card of the encounter deck and takes 1 indirect damage for each boost icon ([boost]) on that card.
real_text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this minion discards the top card of the encounter deck and takes 1 indirect damage for each boost icon ([boost]) on that card.

name: In the Name of Vengence
text: Each enemy gains retaliate 1.

flavor: "Cute kid. Be a shame if something was to happen to her." — Lady Deathstrike

name: Cybermods

name: Stalked by Sabretooth
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, deal 2 damage to Robert Kelly (3 damage instead if there is at least 6[per_hero] threat here). While Robert Kelly is attached to Find the Senator, treat his text box as if it were blank. If Robert Kelly leaves play, the players lose the game.
real_text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, deal 2 damage to Robert Kelly (3 damage instead if there is at least 6[per_hero] threat here). While Robert Kelly is attached to Find the Senator, treat his text box as if it were blank. If Robert Kelly leaves play, the players lose the game.
back_text: Contents: Sabretooth (I) and Sabretooth (II). (Sabretooth (II) and Sabretooth (III) for expert mode.) Sabretooth and Standard sets. Two modular sets (Brotherhood and Mystique). Setup: Put the Find the Senator side scheme into play. Attach the Robert Kelly to it. While attached to Find the Senator, Robert Kelly is in play but under no player's control.

name: The Injured Senator
text: When Completed: Defeat Robert Kelly. If Robert Kelly leaves play, the players lose the game.
real_text: When Completed: Defeat Robert Kelly. If Robert Kelly leaves play, the players lose the game.
flavor: Get Robert Kelly to safety before Sabretooth finishes the job.
back_text: When Revealed: Deal each player a facedown encounter card.
back_flavor: Sabretooth has wounded Senator Kelly and continues to hound him!

name: Night of the Sentinels
text: Operation Zero Tolerance gains permanent. Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is at least 5[per_hero] threat here, the first player places the top card of their deck facedown under Operation Zero Tolerance. Then, remove 5[per_hero] threat from this scheme.
real_text: Operation Zero Tolerance gains permanent. Forced Response: After threat is placed here, if there is at least 5[per_hero] threat here, the first player places the top card of their deck facedown under Operation Zero Tolerance. Then, remove 5[per_hero] threat from this scheme.
back_text: Contents: Sentinel (I) and Sentinel (II). (Sentinel (II) and Sentinel (III) for expert mode.) Project Wideawake, Zero Tolerance, and Standard sets. One modular set (Sentinels). Setup: Set each [[Captive]] ally aside. Reveal the Operation Zero Tolerance and Mutants at the Mall side schemes.

name: The Sentinel Factory
text: Each [[Sentinel]] minion gains guard. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the encounter deck until they discard a [[Sentinel]] minion, then puts it into play engaged with them.
real_text: Each [[Sentinel]] minion gains guard. When Revealed: Each player discards cards from the encounter deck until they discard a [[Sentinel]] minion, then puts it into play engaged with them.
back_text: Contents: Master Mold (I) and Master Mold (II). (Master Mold (II) and Master Mold (III) for expert mode.) Master Mold, Sentinels, and Standard sets. One modular set (Zero Tolerance). Setup: Put the Magneto Ally (172B) into play under the first player's control.

name: Master Mold's Agenda
text: Each [[Sentinel]] minion gains guard. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text: Each [[Sentinel]] minion gains guard. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
flavor: Master Mold's programming has backfired! Recognizing that mutants come from humans, the giant Sentinel is programming its 'offspring' to subdue everyone on Earth!
back_text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Each player discards cards from the encounter deck until they discard a [[Sentinel]] minion, then puts it into play engaged with them.

name: The Brotherhood Strikes!
text: When Revealed: Deal each player a facedown encounter card. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. Add this card to the victory display.
real_text: When Revealed: Deal each player a facedown encounter card. Advance to the next card in the main scheme deck. Add this card to the victory display.
flavor: The Xavier Institute is under attack by the Brotherhood of Mutants!
back_text: Contents: Avalanche (A), Blob (A), Pyro (A), and Toad (A). (Use their (B) sides for expert mode.) Mansion Attack, Brotherhood, and Standard sets. One modular set (Mystique). Setup: Put the Save the School environment into play. Shuffle all copies of main scheme 2A and stack them under this scheme. Shuffle the villains together (without looking) to create the villain deck. The top card of this deck is in play.

name: The Atrium

name: Asteroid M
text: Forced Response: After you place a magnet counter on this scheme, if there are at least 3 magnet counters here, discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded. Reveal that card, then remove 3 magnet counters from this scheme.

name: Factory Online
text: Forced Response: After you place a magnet counter on this scheme, if there are at least 3 magnet counters here, discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[Magnetic]] card is discarded. Reveal that card, then remove 3 magnet counters from this scheme.
